title: State-funded schools rated good or outstanding
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ofsted
summary: Percentage of state-funded Nursery schools, Primary schools, Secondary schools, Alternative Provision (AP) schools and Special schools that are rated ‘Good’ or ‘Outstanding’ by Ofsted, England (state-funded schools), as at 30 September 2024
description:
This dataset shows the percentage of state-funded Nursery schools, Primary schools, Secondary schools, Alternative Provision (AP) schools and Special schools that are rated ‘Good’ or ‘Outstanding’ by Ofsted, in England (state-funded schools), as at 30 September 2024.

### Coverage 

England (state-funded schools)

#### Geography definition

Counties and Unitary Authorities,
Regions,
Nation (England)

### Source

 - England: [Ofsted](https://www.gov.uk/government/statistical-data-sets/monthly-management-information-ofsteds-school-inspections-outcomes) 


### Source Notes and Caveats 
- These figures cover all state-funded schools in England and are updated on a rolling basis.

- The data covers inspections carried out between 01 September 2023 to 31 August 2024 and published by 30 September 2024.

measure.label: Schools and nursery rated good or outstanding
